job.title: Biometrics Analyst SME

job.description: ltstronggtltugtPosition SummaryltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtThe Biometrics SME will provide technical support to the PM DoD Biometrics Chief Engineer Provide testing capabilities in portfolio including NATO supportltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtDuties Include But Not Limited Toltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtltstronggt Essential Duties and Responsibilities ltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligt
